entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
